CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(pse__Historical_Start_Date__c)), IF( pse__Historical_Calendar_Hours__c=0,1, (pse__Historical_Billable_Hours__c + pse__Historical_Credited_Hours__c + pse__Historical_Excluded_Hours__c + pse__Historical_Non_Billable_Hours__c)/ pse__Historical_Calendar_Hours__c ), IF( pse__Scheduled_Calendar_Hours__c=0,1, (pse__Scheduled_Billable_Hours__c + pse__Scheduled_Credited_Hours__c + pse__Scheduled_Excluded_Hours__c + pse__Scheduled_Non_Billable_Hours__c)/ pse__Scheduled_Calendar_Hours__c ) )
CustomField.label: Capacity
